thread.title: Silversea's new ship will be called Silver Muse
thread.title_full: Silversea's new ship will be called Silver Muse

title: Silversea's new ship will be called Silver Muse
text:
Silversea's new ship will be called Silver Muse 1 July 2015 Save 
Silversea Cruises has announced its new flagship will be called the Silver Muse. 
Scheduled to be delivered in the spring of 2017, the new ship is currently under construction at the Fincantieri shipyard. 
Upon completion the ship will have space for 596 guests and will grow the cruise operator’s fleet to nine ships. 
Silversea chief executive Enzo Visone said: “With enhanced design specifications and enriched content, the Silver Muse will continue to build on the sophistication, innovative style and ground-breaking concepts for which Silversea ships are renowned. 
“This ship contributes to our ambitious growth plans that will ensure our continued leadership in ultra-luxury cruising.” 
Additional details and specifications on the new ship will be announced in the near future.
